Sector.Name: Arzul
Ingukrax
Sector.Credits: Arzul sector was designed by Jeff Zeitlin. Stellar positions were developed by Joe D. Fugate Sr. and appear in The MegaTraveller Alien, Volume 1: Vilani & Vargr (Digest Group Publications, 1990). Arzul sector 1248 borders designed by Shane MacLean, Eric O'Dell and Michael Taylor and appears in 1248 Sourcebook 1: Out of Darkness(ComStar Media/Avenger Enterprises, 2006).

Product.Author: Martin J. Dougherty
Product.Title: 1248 Sourcebook 1: Out of Darkness
Product.Publisher: Avenger Enterprises in association with Comstar Media, LLC.
